text: Stranger Than Paradise is a 1984 American German comedy movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and starring John Lurie, Eszter Balint, Richard Edson, Cecillia Stark, Tom DiCillo, Sara Driver. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Jarmusch Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Cleveland
title: Stranger Than Paradise
